content.rendered:
Sublimated Raglan Style Sports T-Shirt

Our Sublimated Raglan Style Sports T-Shirt is crafted from 100% polyester, ensuring both durability and comfort. The polyester fabric is lightweight and breathable, making it perfect for sports and active wear. Its raglan style enhances mobility, providing a sporty fit that looks great and feels even better.

Advanced Sublimation Printing

We use modern HD sublimation techniques for embellishment, allowing for vibrant, long-lasting prints. This advanced printing method covers the entire shirt, ensuring that designs are sharp and colors are vivid. Whether you need intricate patterns or bold logos, our sublimation process guarantees a high-quality finish that stands out.

Customization to Meet Your Needs

Customization options are available to suit your specific needs. We offer labeling and branding services on demand, allowing you to add your company logo or any other design elements you require. Additionally, our t-shirts come in a wide range of colors, all customizable to match your brand’s palette. We also ensure that our shirts are finished with quality seam detailing, adding to their overall durability and aesthetic appeal.

Versatile Sizing and Bulk Availability

Our Sublimated Raglan Style Sports T-Shirts are available in sizes ranging from S to 3XL, with other sizes available on demand. This ensures a perfect fit for every member of your team or customer base. As a manufacturer, supplier, and wholesaler, we specialize in providing bulk quantities to meet your large-scale needs. Whether you’re outfitting a sports team, a company event, or need retail stock, we have the capacity to fulfill your orders with high-quality products.

excerpt.rendered:
Sublimated Raglan T-Shirts are sporty fits, making it an ideal choice for outfitting teams and groups in bulk orders.

  • Material : 100% Polyester
  • Style :Raglan
  • Durability : Soft & Sporty fit
  • Embellishment : Modern HD sublimation
  • Print Options : Overall
  • Customization : Labeling & branding on demand
  • Color : Any/On demand
  • Finishing : Quality seams detailing
  • Sizes : S to 3XL (Available on demand)
  • MOQ : 40
